portfolio.title: Global Par-tea Website
description: Global Par-tea is a website that allows the user to enter in their name,
which accent they would like it to be pronounced in,
their preferred pronouns, and a small self-introduction.

Every entry is displayed in its own box and users can click each one to listen to the person’s name pronunciation. This way, we’ve created an interactive meeting room for everyone to get more comfortable with one another.
